sentence.english: She always drinks coffee in the morning.
sentence.spanish: Ella siempre toma café por la mañana.

sentence.english: Are you usually at home by 6 PM?
sentence.spanish: ¿Usualmente estás en casa para las 6 PM?

sentence.english: They are often travelling for work these days.
sentence.spanish: Ellos a menudo están viajando por trabajo estos días.

sentence.english: He wasn't frequently visiting his grandparents last year.
sentence.spanish: Él no visitaba frecuentemente a sus abuelos el año pasado.

sentence.english: I don't sometimes understand the instructions.
sentence.spanish: A veces no entiendo las instrucciones.

sentence.english: Are they occasionally meeting for lunch?
She wasn't seldom late for appointments.
sentence.spanish: Ella casi nunca llegaba tarde a las citas.

sentence.english: He rarely eats fast food anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él raramente come comida rápida ahora.

sentence.english: Do you hardly ever watch television?
They never forget to call on birthdays.
sentence.spanish: Ellos nunca olvidan llamar en los cumpleaños.

sentence.english: She doesn't exercise every day of the week.
sentence.spanish: Ella no hace ejercicio cada día de la semana.

sentence.english: She visited Paris once when she was twenty.
sentence.spanish: Ella visitó París una vez cuando tenía veinte años.

sentence.english: Are you checking your email twice a day?
sentence.spanish: ¿Revisas tu correo electrónico dos veces al día?

sentence.english: He wasn't calling his mother three times a week.
sentence.spanish: Él no llamaba a su madre tres veces por semana.

sentence.english: They are exercising four times a week now.
sentence.spanish: Ellos están haciendo ejercicio cuatro veces por semana ahora.

sentence.english: I haven't visited London five times this year.
sentence.spanish: No he visitado Londres cinco veces este año.

sentence.english: Did she remind you several times about the meeting?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te recordó varias veces sobre la reunión?

sentence.english: He has told that story many times before.
sentence.spanish: Él ha contado esa historia muchas veces antes.

sentence.english: She doesn't go to the gym once every 2 days anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no va al gimnasio una vez cada 2 días.
